titles.title: A bill to create a new Federal grant program that provides grants to State libraries to allow schools with summer lunch programs to keep their libraries open for student use during the summer months.
Summer Meals and Learning Act of 2019
Summer Meals and Learning Act of 2019
Summer Meals and Learning Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
